title: Tallman List Schema
description: Schema for Tallman drug name lists used across all language implementations

id.description: Unique identifier for this list (e.g., AU, FDA, ISMP, NZ, DEFAULT)

description.description: Human-readable description of the list and its source

source.description: URL or reference to the authoritative source for this list

entries.description: Array of drug names with Tallman lettering (canonical output form)
